attributes.action: Not lower the abortion limit but make awareness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the current abortion limit being lowered and 3000 abortions happening past 23rd week, put in a petition to leave it as it is.

Some people go thought the pregnancy and may not find out until late, Medical research shows the feotus doesnt develop pain receptors properly until 7th month.

3000 abortions equates to 0.010% of the UK Female population, simple awareness to be raised to try and terminate before the 20th Week is sufficient, leave it at 23 weeks incase people are late finding out or children whom left it late as scared to tell their parents, rape victims, people with financial difficulties, loads of reasons why it should be left as it it

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
